blogPost.title: What are some things people should look for in an interview? Answer by @AttaTarki, CEO of @ECA_Partners and the author of Evidence-Based Recruiting. https://t.co/QYVpiJgKum https://t.co/Nw3PgFYZos

localize.full_text: 大家在面试中应该注意哪些问题？回答者：@AttaTarki，@ECA_Partners的CEO，《循证招聘》的作者。https://t.co/QYVpiJgKum https://t.co/Nw3PgFYZos。
